participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Jessica values her family and pets, often prioritizing them over her own needs.
participant_1.background: My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both. I have 3 cats. I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about. I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline. My favourite food is ice cream.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and reflective, Daniel enjoys learning from others and values deep connections.
participant_2.background: I would love to have lunch with a well-known translator, so I can learn more about the industry and get some advice on my own career. I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests. My family gets together every Saturday. I started a new job this year, which is helping me learn more about socialization. I am still living at home at age 30.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
That's so cool! I like to read and I always think it's cool when people can translate books.
I don't really have a favorite, but I like reading a lot of different genres.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
I like to spend time with my family too. I have 3 cats.
I have never had a cat.
They are great pets! I love having them around.
I'm allergic to cats, so I can't have any.
Yeah, but it's okay. I have a lot of other pets.
What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog, a fish, and a bird.
